name: Optimising sociotechnical systems with Ben Ford, CEO and founder of Missionctrl.dev (Ship It! #55)
summary: Today we are talking how to optimise sociotechnical systems with Ben Ford, founder &amp; CEO of Mission Control. The correct order is: people, process &amp; technology. The tools are important, and we talk about specific ones in the second half of this episode, but there are rules and principles that govern how people ...
